job.title: Software Engineer I (Java/Cloud)
job.description: ltpgtThe successful candidate must be proficient in at least one programming language ie JavaC understand OOP and RDBMS concepts Must be able to learn and directly contribute to the design and delivery of applicationsampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt	Participate in the complete software development lifecycle from requirements through testingltpgtltpgt	Assists in the construction testing and debugging of programs in accordance with engineering standardsltpgtltpgt	Maintains and documents programs in accordance with engineering standardsltpgtltpgt	Maintains technical specifications according to the changes introduced to the code and assist in development of new technical specificationsltpgtltpgt	Suggest estimates of efforts required to implement assigned tasks according to the schedule defined by technical managementltpgtltpgt	Other duties as required to support and meet the needs of the organizationltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequirementsltstronggtltpgtltpgt	Bachelors Degree in process or completed in related field of study or equivalent experienceltpgtltpgt	Up to 4 years of software development experienceltpgtltpgt	Experience with Java 8 or aboveampnbspltpgtltpgt	Experience with 1 or more of the followingltpgtltpgt	o	Web technologies HTML5 JavaScript JQuery RESTltpgtltpgt	Experience with one or more RDBMS Ie proficient in SQLltpgtltpgt	Understand OOP and RDBMS conceptsltpgtltpgt	Knowledge of SDLCltpgtltpgt	Good interpersonal communications skills and ability to work independentlyltpgtltpgt	Strong analytical and problem solving skills and proficient technical writingltpgtltpgt	Working knowledge of Software Version Control systemsltpgtltpgt	Preferred Experience with microservices based architecture and AWSltpgtltpgtltpgt
